attributes.action: WITHDRAW FROM THE TREATY OF ROME AND REPUDIATE THE ECHR
attributes.additional_details: For some strange reason Parliament is defying the will of the People by stubbornly avoiding withdrawal from the interference of the ECHR.  Parliament, by its hubris, is creating such a rift in society over uncontrolled immigration that civil strife is a real possibility.
attributes.background: To get us out of the European Court of Human Rights

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651067
